name: Custom Order: Stitched Chaos greeting cards (Set of 6)
description:
A set of six Stitched Chaos cards! 

Birthday, wedding, encouragement, sympathy, thanks, apology, anniversary... you choose! 
You can even choose the colours! 

* Simply email me to let me know your preferences! kiwipunchdesigns@gmail.com *

This set includes 6 greeting cards and 6 envelopes. 
Card size: approximately 4.25"x5.5".

Each card is lovingly and individually handmade

name: Custom order: Ribbon Rose cards
description:
These elegant cards can be used for a variety of occassions! Birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, thanks, congratulations, etc. 

Each card is individually-made, which means that you can choose the colours of each card and the words on the card!

Prices vary based on the number of cards you order: 
One card: $4.50 each
Five cards: $4.25 each
10 cards: $4.00 each
15 cards: $3.50 each
20 cards: $3.00 each

Each card is accompanied by a handmade envelope. 

Size: approximately 4.25"x5.5"

name: Custom order: Embroidered greeting cards (set of 5)
description:
A set of five hand-embroidered greeting cards. 

The Kiwi Punch Designs' hand-embroidered greeting cards are available in a variety of different designs. Some of the most popular cards include: 
- Happy 'b'-day (featuring a smiling bee)
- You Rock! (encouragement cards)  
- G'Day (based on the scrumptious Australian accent)
- Thank you cards
- Wedding cards
- 'ello (based on the British accent) 
- Whaddup?
- Congratulations
- You're a Star (encouragement cards)
- holla
- Happy Biking (for bicycle lovers) 
- etc!

The options are basically limitless! 

Email Catherine at kiwipunchdesigns@gmail.com to discuss options! 
Feel free to visit the KPD blog (www.kiwipunchdesigns.blogspot.com) for more images!

name: Custom Order: Tree on the Wall
description:
Kiwi Punch Designs' Tree on the Wall stitched canvas pieces feature a woodgrain design which has been hand-stitched into canvas. 

Each piece is individually made. Just like with real trees, no two Tree on the Walls are the same!

And you can choose the colours to match your decor!

The prices of each Tree on the Wall vary depending on the size of the canvas. 

Email Catherine at kiwipunchdesigns@gmail.com to obtain price quotes and discuss colour options. 

For more pictures, feel free to visit the KPD blog at www.kiwipunchdesigns.blogspot.com

name: Custom Order: Stitched Canvas Wall Quote
description:
What is your favourite quote/saying/expression? 

The Stitched Canvas Wall Quotes feature various phrases/quotes that have been hand-embroidered into canvas. 

AND, you can choose the colours to match your decor!

Email Catherine at kiwipunchdesigns@gmail.com to receive a price quote. 
Prices vary based on the size of the phrase and canvas.
